body.p: These samples exemplify how the AI Positron Assistant add-on can be used to increase a technical documentation writer's productivity.
The samples can be used with the Oxygen AI Positron Assistant add-on for the Oxygen XML Author/Editor desktop or the in-browser WebAuthor application.
How to work with the samples:

ul.li:
If you have installed Oxygen XML Author/Editor desktop:
Install in Oxygen the AI Positron Assistant add-on:
Clone or download this project.
Open in the Project view the ai-positron-samples.xpr.
Open in the Oxygen "DITA Maps Manager" view the ai_positron_assistant_samples.ditamap.
Follow the instructions and samples in the DITA Map.

If you want to work with the Oxygen WebAuthor in-browser editor and have a GitHub Account:
Open the demo WebAuthor distribution and open the samples DITA Map.
Use the pre-installed AI Positron Assistant side view.
